com.ibm.team.enterprise.scd.common.api

Interface IScdPropertyFile


  • public interface IScdPropertyFile
    An IScdPropertyFile contains the source code data for a single file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds new SCD properties to the list of properties

      Retrieves all the SCD properties for the SCD property file
      java.util.List<IScdProperty> getAllProperties(java.lang.String namespace, java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves all the SCD properties with the same namespace and name provided

      Returns the file for this SCD property file

      Retrieves the first SCD property in the property list with the same namespace and name provided

      Returns the number of properties in the SCD property file

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        com.ibm.team.filesystem.common.IFileItemHandle getFile()
        Returns the file for this SCD property file
        Returns:
        The file for this SCD file

      • getProperty

        IScdProperty getProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves the first SCD property in the property list with the same namespace and name provided
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        Returns:
        A first SCD property in the property list with the same namespace and name; or null if no property found in list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null

      • getAllProperties

        java.util.List<IScdProperty> getAllProperties(java.lang.String namespace,
                                            java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves all the SCD properties with the same namespace and name provided
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        Returns:
        A list of SCD properties with the same namespace and name; never null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null

      • getAllProperties

        java.util.List<IScdProperty> getAllProperties(boolean includeScmProperties)
        Retrieves all the SCD properties for the SCD property file
        Parameters:
        includeScm - Flag indicating if the read only SCM properties should be included in the retrieved property list
        Returns:
        A list of SCD properties

      • addProperty

        void addProperty(IScdProperty newProperty)
        Adds a new SCD property to the list of properties
        Parameters:
        property - The property to add to the SCD property list; must not be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the new property has a property value type that is different than existing properties with the same namespace and name then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See IScdPropertyFactory.SCM_NAMESPACE.

      • addProperties

        void addProperties(java.util.List<IScdProperty> newProperties)
        Adds new SCD properties to the list of properties
        Parameters:
        properties - The list of properties to add to the property list; must not be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the new property has a property value type that is different than existing properties with the same namespace and name then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See IScdPropertyFactory.SCM_NAMESPACE.

      • removeProperty

        void removeProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                  java.lang.String name)
        Removes the first property in the property list with the same namespace and name for the SCD property file
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        removeAll - Flag indicating if the operation removes all properties with the same namespace and name or just the first one in the list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See IScdPropertyFactory.SCM_NAMESPACE.

      • removeAllProperties

        void removeAllProperties(java.lang.String namespace,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Removes all properties in the property list with the same namespace and name for the SCD property file
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        removeAll - Flag indicating if the operation removes all properties with the same namespace and name or just the first one in the list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See IScdPropertyFactory.SCM_NAMESPACE.

      • containsProperty

        boolean containsProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Searches the list for the specified property
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property being searched for; must not be null
        name - The name of the property being searched for; must not be null
        Returns:
        true if at least one property with the same namespace and name exists in the SCD property file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null

      • propertySize

        int propertySize()
        Returns the number of properties in the SCD property file
        Returns:
        The number of properties
